author: adrie
title: OK, so there is bilirubin in the Shroud bloodstains (or so we are told). But how much precisely?

author: adrie
post: Right, Colin. Again I agree. I have no intention either of combining the two, ever. Thanks for all your input on this blog and others. I’ve enjoyed our conversation and will probably still visit this blog, once in a while, as a great source of information and photos. Good luck!.
title: OK, so there is bilirubin in the Shroud bloodstains (or so we are told). But how much precisely?
